attributes.action: Temporarily cut VAT & tax on fuel to help people off set the rise in living cost
attributes.additional_details: Temporarily cut VAT & tax on fuel to help while the ukraine crisis on to help off set the sharpe rise in fuel cost due to this. I believe a reduction will help normal people achieve such basic things of heating home, travelling work and have money to spend in the wider economy. I believe this can be done and keep the margin of tax you would have made before the rise
attributes.background: Temporarily cut VAT & tax on fuel to help while the ukraine crisis on to help off set the sharpe rise in fuel cost due to this. I believe a reduction will help normal people achieve such basic things of heating home, travelling work and have money to spend in the wider economy.

rejection.details: We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
